betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Shoes that come through the injection of magic leather shoes, it allows you to move faster than usual, jump higher, slightly increase the speed of movement in the water, can be automatically on a square, need to charge the aura to play the effect, the item will be placed on the charging base to suck the surrounding aura for charging, the capacity of the aura of 240 points, you can also make a magic amulet, wear it anytime and anywhere to recharge the power. 

 Synthesized Traveler's Boots durability ratio is the same as the durability ratio of the leather boots of the synthesized material, when synthesizing, please try to use full durability leather boots.
